version_description: Language detection issue for Traditional Chinese fixed.

iOS 10 compatibility fixes.
Save game and progression related bug fixes.
This content update comes with 4 new bonus missions and a bunch of new rewards. Enjoy!

This update brings the Ava Mission Pack add-on!

Follow Ava on her adventures in ten new missions! Her arsenal and playstyle focus more on crowd control and trickery, than brute force.

This update brings the Ava Mission Pack add-on!

Follow Ava on her adventures in ten new missions! Her arsenal and playstyle focus more on crowd control and trickery, than brute force.

Fixes incorrect loadout/character issue some players experienced on Ava's 2nd level.

This update brings the Ava Mission Pack add-on!

Follow Ava on her adventures in ten new missions! Her arsenal and playstyle focus more on crowd control and trickery, than brute force.

- Yet another fix for the incorrect loadout/character issue some players experienced on Ava's 2nd level.
- Improved support for iPhoneX.

This update brings the Ava Mission Pack add-on!

Follow Ava on her adventures in ten new missions! Her arsenal and playstyle focus more on crowd control and trickery, than brute force.

- Improved support for iPhone X.
- App size reduced with improved compression.
- Many fixes and tweaks.
This update brings a bonus mission for the Ava Mission Pack and as usual a bunch of tweaks and fixes!

* Improved UI-scaling on newer devices
* Minor bug fixes

* Improved support for new devices
* Minor bugfixes

* Fixed crash on some older systems.
* Minor bugfixes
